document_data.mainbody:
illian was a teenager that served in the Company of Dawn mercenary company for a time during the midâ€“14 century DR.
The young woman had sun-tanned skin, straggly brown hair and blue eyes.
She was very agile and adept at climbing trees without giving notice of her movements.
Gillian was killed during her companys ill-fated journey through Spiderhaunt Wood during the Time of Troubles in the . She was the first of her fellows to die, her body impaled by the made bladed legs of a giant spider.
